attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: dear sir with reference to the price of diesel fuel=we are a small company based near wolverhampton and opperate 25 goods vehicles the impact on us in the last 6months has cost us 3three thousand pounds extra per week, all of which we have pay ourselves, we cannot adjust our rates because we have yearly agreements, therefore our cashflow has disappeared, in your wisdom is there anything you can do for the small haulier please.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
